component.name: FreeRDP Remote Desktop Client
component.summary: FreeRDP (Remote Desktop Protocol) Client for Linux.

description.p:
FreeRDP flatpak provides xfreerdp and wlfreerdp clients for systems lacking proper H264 support.
By default a client suitable to your environment is started (xfreerdp for X11, wlfreerdp for wayland) * start with 'flatpak run --command=xfreerdp com.freerdp.FreeRDP' to force the use of xfreerdp. * 'flatpak run --command=freerdp-proxy com.freerdp.FreeRDP' to start proxy

screenshot.caption: Choose between a full desktop session or a seamlessly integrated remote application
